code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import"./ShippingForm.css";import axios from'axios';import Swal from'sweetalert2';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ShippingForm=()=>{const[shippingAddress,setShippingAddress]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handlePlaceOrder=()=>{axios.get("http://localhost:8000/order/placeOrder/"+shippingAddress,{headers:{"Authorization":'Bearer '+sessionStorage.getItem("AuthToken")}}).then(response=>{Swal.fire({icon:"success",text:response.data}).then(()=>{navigate("/home");});}).catch(err=>{Swal.fire({icon:"error",text:"Could not complete your order"});});};const handleProceedToHome=()=>{navigate('/home');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"shipping-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Shipping Information"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"shipping-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter your shipping address",value:shippingAddress,onChange:e=>setShippingAddress(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button",onClick:()=>{handlePlaceOrder();},children:"Confirm"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleProceedToHome,className:"button",children:"Proceed to Home"})]})]});};export default ShippingForm;
